Title: Acute Dengue patients: whole blood
Description: Analysis of blood from patients with acute Dengue virus (DENV) infection and during convalescence. Dengue is a mosquito-borne infectious disease and Dengue Hemorrhagic Fever is a life-threatening illness. Results provide insight into molecular mechanisms underlying host response to DENV infection.
Reference: Nucleic Acids Res. 2005 Jan 1;33 Database Issue:D562-6
